method.name: add_filter
method.description: Adds a comma-delimited file extension filter option to the [code]EditorFileDialog[/code] with an optional semi-colon-delimited label. Example: "*.tscn, *.scn; Scenes", results in filter text "Scenes (*.tscn, *.scn)".

method.name: clear_filters
method.description: Removes all filters except for "All Files (*)".

method.name: get_vbox
method.description: Returns the [code]VBoxContainer[/code] used to display the file system.

method.name: invalidate
method.description: Notify the [code]EditorFileDialog[/code] that its view of the data is no longer accurate. Updates the view contents on next view update.

members.member: The location from which the user may select a file, including [code]res://[/code], [code]user://[/code], and the local file system.
The file system path in the address bar.
If [code]true[/code] the [code]EditorFileDialog[/code] will not warn the user before overwriting files.
The view format in which the [code]EditorFileDialog[/code] displays resources to the user.
The purpose of the [code]EditorFileDialog[/code]. Changes allowed behaviors.
If [code]true[/code] hidden files and directories will be visible in the [code]EditorFileDialog[/code].

signal.name: dir_selected
signal.description: Emitted when a directory is selected.

signal.name: file_selected
signal.description: Emitted when a file is selected.

signal.name: files_selected
